text: François Budet (3 October 1940 - 5 July 2018) was a French singer-songwriter, novelist and poet. He was known for his songs "Loguivy-de-la-mer", "Chante : Loguivy de la mer" and "Calédonie". He was born in Plaine-Haute, Côtes-d'Armor. Budet died on 5 July 2018 in Plaine-Haute, Côtes-d'Armor from a stroke, aged 78. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French singers Category:French songwriters Category:French novelists Category:French poets
title: François Budet
